title: lama1098
author: lama1098
content: Hello folks,Here my painting ready to become part of your personal collection.Only one piece available. Price: 0.0065BTC*shipping included in Europe. we will see it at the time of sale based on your location.Soon other amazin pieces.https://i.imgur.com/VXLs1vv.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/VXLs1vv.png

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: lama1098 on June 23, 2022, 08:19:38 AMQuoting for visibility. Nice work, I like it.  p.s. what are the dimensions of this?

comments.author: lama1098
comments.body: Thanks a lot!!!Good questionThe dimensions is 29x40 cm!

comments.author: COINAMITE
comments.body: Did you make this yourself? I'm actually loving it ! Does it come with the full frame?Would you be interested in finding a long-term member to be an escrow for this trade?

comments.author: lama1098
comments.body: Hi!! Yess, I make it by myself!Thanks you a lot!Yess, it will come with the frame.And, last but not least, I've no problem to find a long-term member to be an escrow for the trade. However, keep in mind that the escrow fee is not included in the price

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: lama1098 on June 28, 2022, 08:35:03 PMAnd, last but not least, I've no problem to find a long-term member to be an escrow for the trade. However, keep in mind that the escrow fee is not included in the price for you OP, escrow is more than mandatory. you don’t want to go out with the extra possible delivery costs.I certainly believe you are both aware that for escrow you need to find some established and reliable member, it can't be a newbie member for sure.good luck with your business.

comments.author: COINAMITE
comments.body: Quote from: lama1098 on June 28, 2022, 08:35:03 PMHi!! Yess, I make it by myself!Thanks you a lot!Yess, it will come with the frame.And, last but not least, I've no problem to find a long-term member to be an escrow for the trade. However, keep in mind that the escrow fee is not included in the price I'm highly interested. However, keep in mind that the escrow fee is not included in the price for you OP, escrow is more than mandatory. you don’t want to go out with the extra possible delivery costs.I certainly believe you are both aware that for escrow you need to find some established and reliable member, it can't be a newbie member for sure.good luck with your business.Thanks for the input!

comments.author: aoluain

comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 28, 2022, 09:09:55 PMQuote from: lama1098 on June 28, 2022, 08:35:03 PMAnd, last but not least, I've no problem to find a long-term member to be an escrow for the trade. However, keep in mind that the escrow fee is not included in the price for you OP, escrow is more than mandatory. you don’t want to go out with the extra possible delivery costs.I certainly believe you are both aware that for escrow you need to find some established and reliable member, it can't be a newbie member for sure.good luck with your business.Agreed.There is a very informative thread in the Collectibles board titled HOW TO BUY AND SELL HEREwith a link to a thread regarding escrow, ₿ LIST ₿ Bitcointalk's ESCROW providers: Ranking & Blacklist ☠ Avoid Scam ☠Nice art piece @lama1098 what medium did you use? oil on canvas?....:::edit:::....↓ ah ok, very good, so its an original artwork!

comments.author: lama1098
comments.body: Thank you for your sharing @aoluain!I used acrylic on canvas

comments.author: lama1098
comments.body: Quote from: COINAMITE on June 29, 2022, 06:44:41 AMI'm highly interested. What are the estimated shipping fees to EU?The shipping price changes changes according to your country. Indicatively it ranges from $20 to $50
